metadata.Title: CVE-2020-11724 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in OpenResty before 1.15.8.4. ngx_http_lua_subrequest.c allows HTTP request smuggling, as demonstrated by the ngx.location.capture API.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> The lua module is included in the debian directory as it is not part of the upstream nginx release. It is included in the nginx-extras binary package in universe.

criterions.comment: nginx: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
